kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Execute
Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.
kw.msg: ${output} = 2019-07-31 00:02:01 INFO MetricsConfig:118 - Loaded properties from hadoop-metrics2.properties 2019-07-31 00:02:01 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:374 - Scheduled Metric snapshot period at 10 second(s). 2019...

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: 2019-07-31 00:02:01 INFO MetricsConfig:118 - Loaded properties from hadoop-metrics2.properties 2019-07-31 00:02:01 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:374 - Scheduled Metric snapshot period at 10 second(s). 2019-07-31 00:02:01 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:191 - XceiverClientMetrics metrics system started 2019-07-31 00:02:02 INFO GrpcClientProtocolClient:255 - client-A8210526AD2F->1dc7632f-f909-4622-bb81-efb89d88d90c: receive RaftClientReply:client-A8210526AD2F->1dc7632f-f909-4622-bb81-efb89d88d90c@group-EFB24CE6DA3D, cid=0, SUCCESS, logIndex=1, commits[1dc7632f-f909-4622-bb81-efb89d88d90c:c2] 2019-07-31 00:02:02 INFO GrpcClientProtocolClient:255 - client-A8210526AD2F->1dc7632f-f909-4622-bb81-efb89d88d90c: receive RaftClientReply:client-A8210526AD2F->1dc7632f-f909-4622-bb81-efb89d88d90c@group-EFB24CE6DA3D, cid=1, SUCCESS, logIndex=3, commits[1dc7632f-f909-4622-bb81-efb89d88d90c:c4]

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.name: Execute
Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.msg: ${result} = Found 3 items -rw-rw-rw- 1 hadoop hadoop 1159555 2019-07-31 00:01 o3fs://bucket1.vol1/key1 -rw-rw-rw- 1 hadoop hadoop 22125 1970-02-26 11:01 o3fs://bucket1.vol1/ozone-55842 drwxrwxrwx - ...

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
